Regarding reipan's problems: this happens on files saved with header compression in mkvmerge. If you have the divx tech preview installed to get thumbnail images on mkv files it will hang explorer (make it really slow and eat up the memory). You can fix the file by resaving it in mkvmerge without header compression. Disable it by default in the options. Then restart the computer and delete the original file in "dos" via start->cmd. Or just uninstall the divx tech preview, I guess.
